title: Ep. 228 - An Epidemic Of Groupthink
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, we'll discuss the epidemic of groupthink in our society. People are less and less willing to think for themselves, and form their own ideas and opinions. We will analyze the problem. Also, Jussie Smollett’s lawyer comes up with a hilarious alibi, PETA embarrasses itself again, and I deal with the claim that Jesus was a polite, nice guy who never would have insulted anyone. Date: 03-29-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
